metadata.description:
Beautifully dark and gothic, when Alisk wakes up alone in a cemetery, she thinks she’s in the middle of a nightmare. Terrified, she flees into the night, but realises she is invisible to everyone she meets. She really is dead, with no memory of how it happened…

Will appeal to fans of Neil Gaiman and Tim Burton’s The Corpse Bride and Nightmare Before Christmas.
metadata.name: Alisik
